text:
Radio Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
General Extension Division
Minneapolis 14
December 5> 1956
8'3'
Mr* Frank Schooley
Station WILL-AM-FM-TV
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
You were wonderful to me when I was in Urbana* Thank
you for everything.
Tell Eleanor, thank you for the dinner. I liked your
childrenâ€”and found Jean Brown highly intriguing!
I am traveling to Washington, New York, Lansing and
Ann Arbor as per our conversation. My itinerary is enclosed.
With best personal regards.
Yours sincerely,
\s
Burton Paulu
Manager of KUOM
